bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Note: Of course the Hospitals and the wounded
bibl.orgName: The Walt Whitman Collection, Harry Ransom Humanities Research Center, The University of Texas at Austin
bibl.note: Transcribed from our own digital image of the original manuscript.

body.head: Of course the Hospitals
body.p: * Of course the Hospitals, and the wounded and sick, of the Southern Soldiery Armies would form a part of any sufficient history statement of this theme. I hope some competent authority or authorities will yet give such a statement.
